channel.title: Editing .dat files such as Stackable.dat
channel.description: hmm is there a way to edit it i opened with notepad and this was all i got Edit: doesnt show up well eny way it is like half a box

item.title: Editing .dat files such as Stackable.dat
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

oh i know this one
those stackable and tradeable dat files are loaded from item.java

go into item.java and find

stackable.dat

you see some things like this?

FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("data/stackable.dat")); while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) { if (c == 0) itemStackable[counter] = false; else itemStackable[counter] = true; counter++; } dataIn.close(); } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace:"); e.printStackTrace(); }

between the
}
and
datIn.close();

you would add

itemStackable[11774] = true;

to make dragon arrows stackable
put false to make them not stackable (11774 is the dragon arrow id)
you use the same method for stackable noted, tradable, sellable, and two handed items

edit:

example

FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("data/stackable.dat")); while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) { if (c == 0) itemStackable[counter] = false; else itemStackable[counter] = true; counter++; [b] } itemStackable[11774] = true; dataIn.close();[/b] } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace:"); e.printStackTrace(); }

Read full topic
